metadata.title: CVE-2018-10529 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in LibRaw 0.18.9. There is an out-of-bounds read affecting the X3F property table list implementation in libraw_x3f.cpp and libraw_cxx.cpp.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-10529` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.18.8-2ubuntu1
libraw20 - 0.18.8-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: darktable package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
libraw package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.18.8-2ubuntu1').
rawtherapee package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
